ingredients: 1  cantaloupe,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 8 tablespoons all-purpose flour,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 3  egg yolks, 2 tablespoons water, 1 tablespoon butter,   +   1/4 teaspoon butter flavored extract, 3  egg whites,   +   1/4 teaspoon cream of tartar, 6 tablespoons white sugar, 1 (9 inch) pie crust, baked
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 11%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 81mg 27%, Sodium 220mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 42g 15%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 28g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 25mg 127%, Calcium 20mg 2%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 254mg 5%
